effects.display_string: Set: Holy Shock's healing is increased by 10% and its cooldown is reduced by 10%.
(4) Set: Holy Shock increases the initial healing of your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn by 8%, stacking up to 4 times.
Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply nsurance! to their targets that heals them for 596,979 over 15 sec. nsurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 251,773.
(4) Set: Divine Toll applies nsurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,145, up to 10,728.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.2 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,069 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 186 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Selfless Wings of the Ascended

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 3,786 to 4,627 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 4,627 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for melee combat instead. (2 Min Cooldown)
